p: Psidium striatulum is a native and non-endemic species from Brazil, with occurrence in North (Pará, Roraima and Rondônia states), Northeast (Maranhão state), Midwest (Mato Grosso do Sul and Mato Grosso states), and South (Paraná state) regions. It is known as ‘araçá-mirim’ and ‘araçari’ in Roraima state, Brazil [ 100].
